{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DHP-W310AV |revision=rev B1/C1 |asin=B00BDFHLY4 |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/07/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=Powerline Access Point, extender |fcc_id=KA2HPW310AVB1 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.12 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-AL3A; |cpu2_brand=Atheros |cpu2_model=AR7420;AR7420-AL3C; |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-AL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=HomePlug AFE/Line Driver;Atheros;AR1540;;1; |flags=HomePlug AV |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.50 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:1C:F0 |oui_eth=00:1C:F0 }} {{TagLine|PowerLine AV 500 Wireless N Mini Extender}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model=DHP-W311AV}} (DHP-W311AV)
May be sold as the DHP-W311AV Kit, together with DHP-308AV. :''PowerLine AV+ Wireless Extender Kit''
